NK081(zhu)002:2: sbyin bsreg pa'i nges tshig gang yin /
NK081(zhu)002:5: ro bsregs pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar thob ces brgal ba las /
NK081(zhu)002:7: spyir ro la gnyis nyams su myong ba'i ro dang /
NK081(zhu)002:9: gong ma ni lce'i rnam par shes pas ro kha
NK081(zhu)002:10: mngar la sogs pa myangs nas tshor ba ni nyams
NK081(zhu)002:11: su myong ba'i ro zhes bya'o //
NK081(zhu)002:12: lhag ma bor ba'i ro ni rnam par shes pa
NK081(zhu)002:13: tshe pha rol du 'phos nas gzugs kyi phung po
NK081(zhu)002:14: gdos pa dang bcas pa sa rdo dang 'dra ba
NK081(zhu)002:15: 'jig rten 'dir bor nas a tsha a na mi
NK081(zhu)002:16: shes pa de la ro zhes bya'o //
NK081(zhu)002:17: bsreg bya'i nges tshig gang yin zhe na /
NK081(zhu)002:18: bsreg pa la rnam pa gsum ste /
NK081(zhu)002:19: rgyun bsreg pa ni lta ba'i rnams skabs rdo rje
NK081(zhu)002:20: lta bu'i ye shes kyis cho ga thams cad mnyam
NK081(zhu)002:21: pa nyid kyi ngang du rtogs tsa na kun skad
NK081(zhu)002:22: cig ma rgyun dang bral bar rtogs pa ni rgyun
NK081(zhu)002:23: bsregs pa bya ba yin te /
NK081(zhu)002:26: rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyis //
NK081(zhu)002:27: dngos dang dngos min bag chags bsregs //
NK081(zhu)002:28: de min ye shes med zhes bya //
NK081(zhu)002:30: spyod yul bsreg pa zhes bya ba ni /
NK081(zhu)002:31: phrin las kyi gnas skabs na bdag nyid lhar bsgoms pa'i thugs ka nas /
NK081(zhu)002:32: ram las ye shes kyi me byung nas phyi nang gi spyod yul bsreg pa las /
NK081(zhu)002:33: spyod yul bsregs pa zhes bya'o //
NK081(zhu)002:35: srid gsum bsreg pa me yin te //
NK081(zhu)002:36: yid kyi ye shes me ru 'bar //
NK081(zhu)002:38: ro bsreg pa'i ming ni rdzas bsreg pa zhes bya ba yin te /
NK081(zhu)002:40: phung po rdo dang 'dra ba'i rdzas 'di dngos po
NK081(zhu)002:41: mes bsreg pas na rdzas bsreg pa zhes bya ste
NK081(zhu)002:42: / de yang bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud las /
NK081(zhu)002:43: lhag mar bcas pa'i phung po 'di //
NK081(zhu)002:44: ye shes me yi klong du bsreg /ces dang /
NK081(zhu)002:46: ro yi rdzas rnams bsreg sbyangs nas //
NK081(zhu)002:47: ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang //
NK081(zhu)002:48: shin tu dri zhim sna tshogs kyis //
NK081(zhu)002:49: ro la byug cing bsku bar bya //
NK081(zhu)002:50: zhes gsungs te de ni ro bsreg pa'i nges tshig go //
NK081(zhu)002:51: ro bsreg pa'i dgos ched ni /
NK081(zhu)002:52: spyir 'byung ba sa la sbang ba mi 'gal mod /
NK081(zhu)002:53: yum sangs rgyas spyan ma'i rang bzhin yin /
NK081(zhu)002:54: 'byung ba chu la bskyur dang 'gal ba ci yod /
NK081(zhu)002:55: yum m+aa ki'i rang bzhin yin /
NK081(zhu)002:56: ri dang spo yang 'byung ba lnga las byung yin na /
NK081(zhu)002:57: da lta 'byung ba me gcig bus bsreg pa dgos pa ci yin /
NK081(zhu)002:58: de ni 'byung ba rlung dang nam mkha' gnyis la bskyur du mi btub pas /
NK081(zhu)002:59: 'byung ba sa la sbas na srog chags kyi phung po chen po bskyed pa'i nyes dmigs yod /
NK081(zhu)002:60: chu la bskyur na thal ba ma chod rten du bzhengs pa'i gzhi med par 'gyur /
NK081(zhu)002:61: de'i phyir me la srog chags bskyed pa'i gzhir med pa dang /
NK081(zhu)002:62: thal ba mchod rten du btab na byang chub thob
NK081(zhu)002:63: pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas ro mes bsreg pa la dgos
NK081(zhu)002:66: cho ga gzhung du byed pa yin te /
NK081(zhu)002:67: de yang dang po spos chu dang bdud rtsis bkrus pa la dgos pa ci yod /
NK081(zhu)002:68: spos chus bkru ba ni zhi ba'i lha tshogs mnyes par byang ba'i phyir bkru la /
NK081(zhu)002:69: bdud rtsis khro bo'i phyir ro //
NK081(zhu)002:70: 'o na ro la yi ge brgya pa la dgos pa ci yod /
NK081(zhu)002:71: ro la btag nas me la bsregs pa mi 'gal lam /
NK081(zhu)002:72: yi ge 'dogs pa'i dgos pa ni /
NK081(zhu)002:73: rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bsreg pa'i dgos pa yod pa'i phyir dang /
NK081(zhu)002:74: yi ge btags nas me la bsreg pa mi 'gal te /
NK081(zhu)002:75: yi ge ye shes kyi lhar bskyed nas me dpung
NK081(zhu)002:76: 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang du bzhugs pa mi 'gal
NK081(zhu)002:77: lo // yi ge gdags gnas kyi dgos pa gang /
NK081(zhu)002:78: 'dogs pa'i dgos pa ni nyi dal re bsam /
NK081(zhu)002:79: de'i steng du gsung yi ge bkod pa'i 'od zer
NK081(zhu)002:80: gyis rtog pa'i gnas kun bsreg par bsam zhing dgos
NK081(zhu)002:81: / 'o spos mar mgo la bkab pa dgos pa ci yod /
NK081(zhu)002:82: de ni klad pa dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlab pa'i don yin /
NK081(zhu)002:83: 'o na dkar byang gnag byang gi dgos pa gang /
NK081(zhu)002:84: dkar byang bklags nas ru'i lag tu gtad pas ru'i
NK081(zhu)002:85: dgongs pas gshin po de'i dge ba ci byas pa
NK081(zhu)002:86: thams cad sems can la bsngo ba'i dgos pa yod
NK081(zhu)002:87: / gnag byang bshags pa byas nas thab tu bsregs
NK081(zhu)002:88: pas gshin po'i sdig pa bsregs pa'i dgos pa yod
NK081(zhu)002:89: / / ro bsreg pa'i dus su cho ga mkhan gyi dgongs pa ji ltar byed /
NK081(zhu)002:90: de ni ru shar du bzhugs /
NK081(zhu)002:93: bshags pa mkhan nub tu bzhugs zhes pa kun las gsungs so //
NK081(zhu)002:94: 'o na ro bsreg pa'i me lha gang gis byed //
NK081(zhu)002:95: spyir me lha la gnyis yod /
NK081(zhu)002:98: ro bsreg pa'i 'jig rten pa'i me lha gang yin
NK081(zhu)002:99: na phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong gis mi byed de
NK081(zhu)002:100: / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha snang ba mtha' yas yab yum gyis byed do //
NK081(zhu)002:102: me yi lha ni snang mtha' yas //
NK081(zhu)002:103: me yi lha mo gos dkar mo //
NK081(zhu)002:104: 'byung ba me la dbang bsgyur zhing //
NK081(zhu)002:105: srid gsum bsreg par zhal 'ches ma //
NK081(zhu)002:106: thams cad kun gyi 'od mchog yin //
NK081(zhu)002:108: 'o na bsreg pa'i brtag pa la du yod /
NK081(zhu)002:109: rtags rnam pa drug yod de /
NK081(zhu)002:110: me 'bar ba'i sgra 'ur rgyangs tsheg rgyangs che na /
NK081(zhu)002:111: gshin po de la sgrib pa che ba yin te /
NK081(zhu)002:112: dmyal bar 'gro ba yin pas sbyin sreg mang po bya dgos /
NK081(zhu)002:113: me khog dal bar byas nas 'u ru ru zer
NK081(zhu)002:114: na sgrib pa med de shar phyogs rdo rje rigs
NK081(zhu)002:115: kyi zhing khams su skye ba yin /
NK081(zhu)002:116: me lce mi gsal bar gyur cing mdog nag na sgrib pa yod do //
NK081(zhu)002:117: yi dwags su skye ba yin pas lan chags kyi gtor ma mang du btang /
NK081(zhu)002:118: me lce dkar bar byas nas me lce chad cing
NK081(zhu)002:119: 'gro na lho phyogs rin chen rigs kyi zhing khams
NK081(zhu)002:121: me lce sngo nag tu byas nas rlung gi 'tshub ma bzhin du drag por 'bar na /
NK081(zhu)002:122: lha ma yin gyi gnas su skye ba yin pas dzaba bzlas shing sbyin sreg mang du bya /
NK081(zhu)002:123: me lce dmar la rang lugs su 'bar na nub phyogs bde ba can gyi zhing khams su skye /
NK081(zhu)002:124: me lce rtse mo mang por 'bar na sgrib pa yod pa'i zhad yin te /
NK081(zhu)002:125: yul mtha' 'khob kyi kla klor skye ba yin pas phrin las rnam bzhi bya /
NK081(zhu)002:126: rtse mo gcig tu 'khyil nas 'bar na 'og min
NK081(zhu)002:127: byang phyogs don yod grub pa'i zhing du skye ba
NK081(zhu)002:128: yin / me 'bar du mi btub par du ba
NK081(zhu)002:129: 'tshub cing nag mug ge 'dug na sgrib pa shas
NK081(zhu)002:130: yod pas byol song du skye ba yin pas rnam
NK081(zhu)002:131: par mi rtog pa bsgom zhing rus pa'i thal ba
NK081(zhu)002:133: me lce rdo rje 'khor lo la sogs pa phyag
NK081(zhu)002:134: mtshan gyi dbyibs su 'bar na 'og min la sogs
NK081(zhu)002:135: pa lha gnas su skye bas tshogs mchod bstar bar
NK081(zhu)002:136: bya / ro bsregs pa'i 'bras bu ni 'jig rten 'dir nad dang gdon nyung sdig pa 'dags /
NK081(zhu)002:137: phyi ma rnam pa smin pa'i rig 'dzin thob pa gdon mi za'o //
